title: 1BR 1BA apt | Restored 1930s details | Modern kitchen | Luxury bath
posting_body: ['Walk to theaters, fine restaurants, great Italian food, coffee shops, a vegan restaurant, nightclubs, a grocery store & deli, a drug store, museums and much more — all within two blocks!', 'Light rail and bus stops are just steps away.', 'Let the St. Claire Luxury Loft apartments be your San Jose apartment.', 'This apartment features:', 'Upscale interiors', 'Great views', '17+ foot ceilings and exposed brick walls', 'Restored 1930’s architectural details including original doors & hardware', 'Deluxe kitchens with stainless appliances, including microwave, dishwasher, and disposal', 'Convenient washer and dryer inside', 'Extra storage locker available', 'Come Visit us!', 'St Claire Apartments', '311 S First St', 'San Jose, CA 95113', '<URL>', 'Contact us today to schedule a tour!', 'Call', 'show contact info', 'Office Hours', 'Tuesday - Friday: 9:00 am - 6:00 pm', 'Saturday: 9:00 am - 2:00 pm', 'Photos in ad may not be of actual apartment, however we try our best to use photos similar to the floor plan.', "related search terms ::: Downtown San Jose, Sudio, Above Original Joe's"]
